objects.text:
• Classic retro-styled design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor
• Real-time electronic viewfinder
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Premium Mirrorless Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design with premium build quality
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system compatible with Fujifilm X-mount lenses
• Real-time electronic viewfinder with high resolution display
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting adjustments
• Advanced autofocus system for fast and accurate focusing
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes to recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Tiltable LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Robust metal construction ensuring durability
• Compatible with wide range of professional accessories

banner_details:
The banner showcases a premium camera promotion with an elegant, modern layout. It features a dark, multi-toned background with soft radial gradients and subtle grid lines for depth and texture. The title (`heading`) is large and bold in white, positioned at the top left for maximum visibility. Below it is a vibrant red subtitle (`subheading`) emphasizing the product's quality. Key specifications are listed in a smaller font (`description`) in bullet format. The tagline (`tagline`) adds a professional tone mid-banner. The prominent price (`price`) in large white numerals is followed by a red rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with the text label (`cta`). A high-quality product image (`product_image`) is right-aligned, slightly overlapping the background elements.

**Color palette**:
- Background Black: `#1A1A1A`
- Dark Gray Panels: `#151515`, `#232323`, `#242424`
- Accent Red: `#FF3B30`
- White Text: `#FFFFFF`
- Light Gray Text: `#CCCCCC`
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, primarily in a matte black finish which conveys sleekness and professionalism. The dominant black color (#1A1A1A) is complemented by metallic greys (#4D4D4D) on the lens and dials, adding depth and texture. White highlights (#FFFFFF) in the text and dials enhance readability and contrast, while subtle red (#BF2A23) and orange (#F28C28) accents around the lens focus indicators bring attention to fine details. This monochromatic palette blended with sharp highlights adds a sophisticated and modern appeal. These colors can be used in the banner to evoke a premium, high-tech feel ideal for photography enthusiasts.
